overview:
Since 2009, Coppola has focussed his time within the mobile ecosystem; both apps and web, helping guide major Fortune 100 corporations, such as Procter & Gamble, Coca-Cola, Microsoft, McDonald’s, Disney, etc. through the process of becoming present in the space.

During this historic period of growth, Coppola worked closely with hundreds of top publishers, such as Zynga, Bravo, E!, AOL, etc. looking to monetize in emerging ways. An important part of Coppola’s time is spent helping connect the various players in the ecosystem and coming up with innovative solutions that better engage consumers.

Specialties Mobile, Product, Monetization, Social, Local, Media Sales, Partnerships, Business Development, Public Speaking, Advising

Relationships Fortune 100/500 Brands, Media Agencies, Trading Desks, DSP’s, SSP’s, Exchanges, Ad Networks, Aggregators, Ad Servers, Content Platforms, Payment Platforms, Rich Media Providers, App Discovery, Carriers, Devices
